CheckBox.android:text: 1: Own less than 0.2 Hecters of land and be unable to hire it for food or cash;
2: Have less than three months of food stock starting from harvest time (rain-fed)
3: Own no major common livestock (e.g., cattle, goats, sheep, pigs)
5: Do not participate in a regular income-generating activity
6: Rely on piecework/casual labor to meet daily food needs
